search_linkedin_footprints.description: Searches public LinkedIn profiles by name using search engine footprints.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return.

returns.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs found.

scrape_linkedin_public.description: Extracts visible public data (name, title, job title, about section) from a LinkedIn profile.

returns.description: Dictionary with name, title, job title, about, and error info.

find_github_by_name.description: Searches GitHub users by name using the public API.

name.description: Full name of the GitHub user to look for.

returns.description: Dictionary containing GitHub username or null if not found.

fetch_github_profile.description: Fetches a GitHub profile and top repositories using the public API.

max_repos.description: Maximum number of repos to fetch.

fallback_people_search.description: Searches for other public mentions, resumes, or portfolios by name.

returns.description: List of public URLs mentioning the target.

find_portfolio_link.description: Analyzes LinkedIn and GitHub data to detect a personal or professional website.

sources.description: List of dictionaries containing OSINT data to scan.

returns.description: URL of the detected portfolio or null if not found.

build_professional_snapshot.description: Combines LinkedIn, GitHub, and other OSINT sources into a structured profile snapshot.

name.description: Full name of the person to analyze.

returns.description: Dictionary containing LinkedIn, GitHub, and portfolio data.
